Package ohos.agp.render.render3d

Interface Scene


  • public interface Scene
    Represents scenes that contain entities, such as a scene of 3D objects.
    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SceneNode cloneNode​(SceneNode node, boolean recursive)
      Creates a clone node that copies all components of the original node according to handle values.
      Entity createEntity​()
      Creates an empty entity.
      SceneNode createNode​()
      Creates a node in a scene.
      void destroyEntity​(Entity entity)
      Destroys an entity.
      void destroyNode​(SceneNode node)
      Destroys a node and all its child nodes.
      Engine getEngine​()
      Obtains the engine used by the current scene.
      MorphingSystem getMorphingSystem​()
      Obtains a MorphingSystem instance.
      Optional<SceneNode> getNode​(Entity entity)
      Obtains the scene node of an entity.
      SceneNode getRootNode​()
      Obtains the root node of a scene, which is a container for other nodes and does not point to any entity.
      SceneUtil getSceneUtil​()
      Obtains a SceneUtil instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getEngine

        Engine getEngine​()
        Obtains the engine used by the current scene.
        Returns:
        Returns the engine used by the current scene.

      • getSceneUtil

        SceneUtil getSceneUtil​()
        Obtains a SceneUtil instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the SceneUtil instance.

      • createEntity

        Entity createEntity​()
        Creates an empty entity.
        Returns:
        Returns the created entity.

      • destroyEntity

        void destroyEntity​(Entity entity)
        Destroys an entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - Indicates the entity to destroy.

      • getRootNode

        SceneNode getRootNode​()
        Obtains the root node of a scene, which is a container for other nodes and does not point to any entity.
        Returns:
        Returns the root node of the scene.

      • getNode

        Optional<SceneNode> getNode​(Entity entity)
        Obtains the scene node of an entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - Indicates the scene node to request.
        Returns:
        Returns the root node of the entity. Returns an empty optional if the entity does not have a node, that is,a NodeComponent object.

      • createNode

        SceneNode createNode​()
        Creates a node in a scene. This method creates an entity that consists of the Transform object, node, and requisite matrix. By default, the created node is a child node of the root node.
        Returns:
        Returns the created node.

      • cloneNode

        SceneNode cloneNode​(SceneNode node,
                    boolean recursive)
        Creates a clone node that copies all components of the original node according to handle values. If the handle references resources such as meshes and materials, the clone node copies the handle values to point to the same resources of the original node.
        Parameters:
        node - Indicates the original node to clone.
        recursive - Indicates whether the child nodes are recursively cloned. true indicates that all child nodes are recursively cloned.
        Returns:
        Returns the clone node of the original node.

      • destroyNode

        void destroyNode​(SceneNode node)
        Destroys a node and all its child nodes. The resources used by the node will not be destroyed.
        Parameters:
        node - Indicates the node to destroy.

      • getMorphingSystem

        MorphingSystem getMorphingSystem​()
        Obtains a MorphingSystem instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the MorphingSystem instance.
